verses.verse: וַיִּקָּבְצ֧וּ <S%H6908><s%> vai-yik-ka-ve-Tzu gathered כָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol all יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El Then all Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to דָּוִ֖יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid themselves to David חֶבְר֣וֹנָה <S%H2275><s%> chev-Ro-nah unto Hebron לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying הִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold עַצְמְךָ֥ <S%H6106><s%> 'atz-me-Cha Behold we [are] thy bone וּֽבְשָׂרְךָ֖ <S%H1320><s%> u-ve-sa-re-Cha and thy flesh אֲנָֽחְנוּ׃ <S%H587><s%> 'a-Na-che-nu. we

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- over my people תְּמ֣וֹל <S%H8543><s%> te-Mol And moreover in time גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- even שִׁלְשׁ֗וֹם <S%H8032><s%> shil-Shom, past גַּ֚ם <S%H1571><s%> gam even בִּהְי֣וֹת <S%H1961><s%> bih-Yot become שָׁא֣וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul even when Saul מֶ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech, was king אַתָּ֛ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah who הַמּוֹצִ֥יא <S%H3318><s%> ham-mo-Tzi thou [wast] he that leddest out וְהַמֵּבִ֖יא <S%H935><s%> ve-ham-me-Vi and broughtest in אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; Israel וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-Mer said יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh and the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God לְךָ֗ le-Cha, אַתָּ֨ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah You תִרְעֶ֤ה <S%H7462><s%> tir-'Eh unto thee Thou shalt feed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עַמִּי֙ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi my people אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, Israel וְאַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah you תִּהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yeh become נָגִ֔יד <S%H5057><s%> na-Gid, and thou shalt be ruler עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al over עַמִּ֥י <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi my people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. Israel

וַ֠יָּבֹאוּ <S%H935><s%> Vai-ya-vo-'u Therefore came כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all זִקְנֵ֨י <S%H2205><s%> zik-Nei all the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech to the king חֶבְר֔וֹנָה <S%H2275><s%> chev-Ro-nah, to Hebron וַיִּכְרֹת֩ <S%H3772><s%> vai-yich-Rot made לָהֶ֨ם la-Hem דָּוִ֥יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid and David בְּרִ֛ית <S%H1285><s%> be-Rit a covenant בְּחֶבְר֖וֹן <S%H2275><s%> be-chev-Ron with them in Hebron לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD וַיִּמְשְׁח֨וּ <S%H4886><s%> vai-yim-she-Chu and they anointed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דָּוִ֤יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid David לְמֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> le-Me-lech king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, over Israel כִּדְבַ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> kid-Var according to the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> be-yad- by שְׁמוּאֵֽל׃ <S%H8050><s%> she-mu-'El. Samuel ס sa-Mek

וַיֵּ֨לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech went דָּוִ֧יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid And David וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El and all Israel יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim to Jerusalem הִ֣יא <S%H1931><s%> hi he יְב֑וּס <S%H2982><s%> ye-Vus; which [is] Jebus וְשָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> ve-Sham there הַיְבוּסִ֔י <S%H2983><s%> hay-vu-Si, where the Jebusites יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vei [were] the inhabitants הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. of the land

וַיֹּ֨אמְר֜וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-me-Ru said יֹשְׁבֵ֤י <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vei And the inhabitants יְבוּס֙ <S%H2982><s%> ye-Vus of Jebus לְדָוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid, to David לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo shall not תָב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> ta-Vo Thou shalt not come הֵ֑נָּה <S%H2008><s%> Hen-nah; here וַיִּלְכֹּ֤ד <S%H3920><s%> vai-yil-Kod took דָּוִיד֙ <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid hither Nevertheless David אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מְצֻדַ֣ת <S%H4686><s%> me-tzu-Dat the castle צִיּ֔וֹן <S%H6726><s%> tzi-Yon, of Zion הִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> hi he עִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> 'ir which [is] the city דָּוִֽיד׃ <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid. of David

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said דָּוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, And David כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- Whoever מַכֵּ֤ה <S%H5221><s%> mak-Keh Whosoever smiteth יְבוּסִי֙ <S%H2983><s%> ye-vu-Si the Jebusites בָּרִ֣אשׁוֹנָ֔ה <S%H7223><s%> ba-Ri-sho-Nah, first יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh became לְרֹ֖אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> le-Rosh shall be chief וּלְשָׂ֑ר <S%H8269><s%> u-le-Sar; and captain וַיַּ֧עַל <S%H5927><s%> vai-Ya-'al up בָּרִאשׁוֹנָ֛ה <S%H7223><s%> ba-ri-sho-Nah first יוֹאָ֥ב <S%H3097><s%> yo-'Av So Joab בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son צְרוּיָ֖ה <S%H6870><s%> tze-ru-Yah of Zeruiah וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi became לְרֹֽאשׁ׃ <S%H7218><s%> le-Rosh. and was chief

וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> vai-Ye-shev dwelt דָּוִ֖יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid And David בַּמְצָ֑ד <S%H4679><s%> bam-Tzad; in the castle עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> ken it was קָרְאוּ־ <S%H7121><s%> ka-re-'u- therefore they called ל֖וֹ lo עִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> 'ir it the city דָּוִֽיד׃ <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid. of David

וַיִּ֤בֶן <S%H1129><s%> vai-Yi-ven And he built הָעִיר֙ <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir the city מִסָּבִ֔יב <S%H5439><s%> mis-sa-Viv, round about מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַמִּלּ֖וֹא <S%H4407><s%> ham-mil-Lo even from Millo וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- against הַסָּבִ֑יב <S%H5439><s%> has-sa-Viv; round about וְיוֹאָ֕ב <S%H3097><s%> ve-yo-'Av and Joab יְחַיֶּ֖ה <S%H2421><s%> ye-chai-Yeh repaired אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁאָ֥ר <S%H7605><s%> she-'Ar the rest הָעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir. of the city

וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech greater דָּוִ֖יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid So David הָל֣וֹךְ <S%H1980><s%> ha-Loch greater וְגָד֑וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ve-ga-Dol; and greater וַיהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh for the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot of hosts עִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5973><s%> im-Mo. with פ Peh

וְאֵ֨לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh now these רָאשֵׁ֤י <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shei These also [are] the chief הַגִּבּוֹרִים֙ <S%H1368><s%> hag-gib-bo-Rim of the mighty men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom לְדָוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid, whom David הַמִּתְחַזְּקִ֨ים <S%H2388><s%> ham-mit-chaz-ze-Kim had who strengthened עִמּ֧וֹ <S%H5973><s%> im-Mo together בְמַלְכוּת֛וֹ <S%H4438><s%> ve-mal-chu-To themselves with him in his kingdom עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- together כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El [and] with all Israel לְהַמְלִיכ֑וֹ <S%H4427><s%> le-ham-li-Cho; to make him king כִּדְבַ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> kid-Var according to the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- concerning יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. concerning Israel ס sa-Mek

וְאֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh These מִסְפַּ֥ר <S%H4557><s%> mis-Par And this [is] the number הַגִּבֹּרִ֖ים <S%H1368><s%> hag-gib-bo-Rim of the mighty men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom לְדָוִ֑יד <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid; whom David יָשָׁבְעָ֣ם <S%H3434><s%> ya-sha-ve-'Am had Jashobeam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son חַכְמוֹנִ֗י <S%H2453><s%> chach-mo-Ni, an Hachmonite רֹ֚אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> rosh the chief; הַשְּׁלֹושִׁים hash-she-lo-shim כהַשָּׁ֣לִישִׁ֔ים <S%H7970><s%> hash-Sha-li-Shim, thirty קהֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> hu- he עוֹרֵ֧ר <S%H5782><s%> o-Rer he lifted up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- חֲנִית֛וֹ <S%H2595><s%> cha-ni-To his spear עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against שְׁלֹשׁ־ <S%H7969><s%> she-losh- against three מֵא֥וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred חָלָ֖ל <S%H2491><s%> cha-Lal slain בְּפַ֥עַם <S%H6471><s%> be-Fa-'am time אֶחָֽת׃ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chat. [by him] at one

וְאַחֲרָ֛יו <S%H310><s%> ve-'a-cha-Rav And after אֶלְעָזָ֥ר <S%H499><s%> 'el-'a-Zar him [was] Eleazar בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son דּוֹד֖וֹ <S%H1734><s%> do-Do of Dodo הָאֲחוֹחִ֑י <S%H266><s%> ha-'a-cho-Chi; the Ahohite ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu who בִּשְׁלוֹשָׁ֥ה <S%H7969><s%> bish-lo-Shah who [was one] of the three הַגִּבֹּרִֽים׃ <S%H1368><s%> hag-gib-bo-Rim. mighties

הֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> hu- he הָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah become עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- was with דָּוִ֜יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid He was with David בַּפַּ֣ס bap-Pas דַּמִּ֗ים <S%H6450><s%> dam-Mim, at Pasdammim וְהַפְּלִשְׁתִּים֙ <S%H6430><s%> ve-hap-pe-lish-Tim and there the Philistines נֶאֱסְפוּ־ <S%H622><s%> ne-'es-fu- were gathered together שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> sham there לַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> lam-mil-cha-Mah, to battle וַתְּהִ֛י <S%H1961><s%> vat-te-Hi and there was חֶלְקַ֥ת <S%H2513><s%> chel-Kat where was a parcel הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> has-sa-Deh of ground מְלֵאָ֣ה <S%H4392><s%> me-le-'Ah full שְׂעוֹרִ֑ים <S%H8184><s%> se-'o-Rim; of barley וְהָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> ve-ha-'Am and the people נָ֖סוּ <S%H5127><s%> Na-su fled מִפְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei from before פְלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <S%H6430><s%> fe-lish-Tim. the Philistines

וַיִּֽתְיַצְּב֤וּ <S%H3320><s%> vai-yit-yatz-tze-Vu And they set בְתוֹךְ־ <S%H8432><s%> ve-toch- themselves in the midst הַחֶלְקָה֙ <S%H2513><s%> ha-chel-Kah of [that] parcel וַיַּצִּיל֔וּהָ <S%H5337><s%> vai-yatz-tzi-Lu-ha, and delivered וַיַּכּ֖וּ <S%H5221><s%> vai-yak-Ku it and slew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> pe-lish-Tim; the Philistines וַיּ֥וֹשַׁע <S%H3467><s%> vai-Yoo-sha' saved יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh and the LORD תְּשׁוּעָ֥ה <S%H8668><s%> te-shu-'Ah deliverance גְדוֹלָֽה׃ <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lah. [them] by a great

וַיֵּרְד֡וּ <S%H3381><s%> vai-ye-re-Du went down שְֽׁלוֹשָׁה֩ <S%H7969><s%> she-lo-Shah Now three מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at הַשְּׁלוֹשִׁ֨ים <S%H7970><s%> hash-she-lo-Shim of the thirty רֹ֤אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> rosh captains עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- unto הַצֻּר֙ <S%H6697><s%> hatz-Tzur to the rock אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to דָּוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, to David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into מְעָרַ֖ת <S%H4631><s%> me-'a-Rat into the cave עֲדֻלָּ֑ם <S%H5725><s%> 'a-dul-Lam; of Adullam וּמַחֲנֵ֣ה <S%H4264><s%> u-ma-cha-Neh and the host פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> fe-lish-Tim, of the Philistines חֹנָ֖ה <S%H2583><s%> cho-Nah encamped בְּעֵ֥מֶק <S%H6010><s%> be-'E-mek in the valley רְפָאִֽים׃ <S%H7497><s%> re-fa-'Im. of Rephaim

וְדָוִ֖יד <S%H1732><s%> ve-da-Vid And David אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> 'az was then בַּמְּצוּדָ֑ה <S%H4686><s%> bam-me-tzu-Dah; [was] then in the hold וּנְצִ֣יב <S%H5333><s%> u-ne-Tziv garrison פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> pe-lish-Tim, and the Philistines' אָ֖ז <S%H227><s%> 'az then בְּבֵ֥ית be-Veit לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H1035><s%> La-chem. [was] then at Bethlehem
